query: SELECT * FROM users WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 2000
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = %s AND id BETWEEN 1 AND 2000
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE user_id = %s AND id BETWEEN 1 AND 2000
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM order_reviews GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_id, AVG(rating) FROM order_reviews GROUP BY product_id LIMIT 10
